main_menu.title: OMRON PROXIMITY SENSOR SOLUTIONS
main_menu.description: Omron proximity sensors are engineered for reliable non-contact detection in demanding industrial environments, providing precise sensing of metallic and non-metallic objects. These sensors are widely used in automation lines, packaging systems, and material handling applications where durability, accuracy, and consistent performance are critical. Their rugged construction ensures long service life even under vibration, dust, oil, and moisture exposure.
features: High sensing accuracy with stable output
Robust metal housings for industrial use
Fast switching response for high-speed automation
Long operational life with minimal maintenance

menu_drop1.name: E2B Series
menu_drop1.description: The Omron E2B Series inductive proximity sensors are designed for dependable metal object detection in harsh factory conditions. They feature strong mechanical durability, excellent noise immunity, and long sensing distances, making them ideal for conveyor systems, machine tools, and automated production equipment. Their compact cylindrical design allows easy installation even in space-limited control panels while ensuring consistent long-term performance.
specs: M8, M12, M18, M30 housing options
High resistance to vibration and impact

menu_drop2.name: E2A Series
menu_drop2.description: The E2A Series offers a cost-effective sensing solution without compromising reliability or performance. These proximity sensors provide stable detection in standard automation environments and are widely used in packaging machines, assembly lines, and automated sorting systems. Their simple wiring design and LED operation indicators allow quick installation and easy troubleshooting for maintenance teams.

menu_drop3.name: Inductive Sensors
menu_drop3.description: Omron inductive sensors provide highly accurate metal detection with extended sensing ranges and superior reliability in demanding industrial processes. They are specifically designed to operate consistently in high-speed automation environments where precise object positioning is essential. Their durable design ensures stable performance even in the presence of oil mist, dust, vibration, and temperature fluctuations.

menu_drop4.name: Capacitive Sensors
menu_drop4.description: Omron capacitive proximity sensors are capable of detecting a wide variety of materials including plastic, glass, powders, liquids, and granules. These sensors are commonly used in level detection applications such as tanks, silos, and hoppers, as well as packaging machinery. Their adjustable sensitivity allows fine-tuning for reliable operation across different material types and environmental conditions.
specs: Detects both metallic and non-metallic objects

menu_drop5.name: Pre Wired Sensors
menu_drop5.description: Pre-wired proximity sensors from Omron are designed to simplify installation and reduce wiring time in industrial automation systems. These sensors come with factory-attached cables that ensure secure connections and minimize field wiring errors. They are ideal for fast deployment in conveyor systems, assembly machines, and production lines requiring quick sensor replacement.

menu_drop6.name: M12 Connector Type
menu_drop6.description: Omron M12 connector type proximity sensors provide flexible wiring and fast maintenance through standardized industrial connectors. These sensors are particularly suitable for modular automation systems where frequent replacement or reconfiguration is required. The secure locking mechanism ensures stable signal transmission even under vibration-heavy industrial conditions.
